page.title: 02TRANSPORT
page.content: The area is served by the A424 Stow to Evesham road & the A429 Moreton to Stow, Fosseway.Connections to these roads are via lanes which are more than adequate for the volume of traffic.During periods of heavy snowfall; normally Jan.-Feb.these roads are often blocked & smaller settlements can find themselves cut off.Rail communication is possible from Moreton-in-Marsh & some people commute to London & Evesham using this service.There is also a bus service to Moreton & Cheltenham(via Bourton).On Saturday there is also a bus to Evesham.A service of a different kind is provided by a minibus-'The Villager'driven by voluntary local drivers.A short traffic census in Longborough showed an average of 40 cars passing through the village in an hour.Most families own a car.
